location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Henry Willock, HM Chargé d’Affaires at the Court of Tehran

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of Henry Willock's communications, dated 23, 26, and 29 December 1819 and 3 January 1820 respectively. Bruce promises to forward Willock's despatch for the Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone and transmits a despatch (not included) from Major General William Grant Keir.
